translations: n．哄笑，狂笑：一种突然、粗哑、大声的笑声。
· His joke was met with guffaws from the audience.
他的笑话引起了观众的哄笑。
v．狂笑，哄笑：发出突然、粗哑、大声的笑声。

sentences.sentence: Harry even had to cover his face and duck out of view to hide his uncontrolled guffaws.
sentences.translation: 哈里王子更是一发不可收拾，捂住脸，狂笑起来。后面还有，太长，略掉了。

sentences.sentence: Watson drew guffaws from many in the television audience when it responded “What is Toronto?????”
sentences.translation: 当沃森回答：”多伦多“时，让电视前观众哄堂大笑。

sentences.sentence: Somehow I managed to deliver both speeches off-the-cuff without boos, guffaws or rotten fruit hurled at the podium.
sentences.translation: 尽管这样，我还是成功地发表了两次即席演讲，没有听到嘘声，没有听到哄笑，也没有烂水果扔到讲台上。
